arn.description: The ARN assigned by AWS for this resource group.

configurations.description: A configuration associates the resource group with an AWS service and specifies how the service can interact with the resources in the group. See below for details.

description.description: A description of the resource group.

name.description: The resource group's name. A resource group name can have a maximum of 127 characters, including letters, numbers, hyphens, dots, and underscores. The name cannot start with `AWS` or `aws`.

resourceQuery.description: A `resource_query` block. Resource queries are documented below.

tags.description: Key-value map of resource tags. .If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Group resources.
